name: Bean UI Kit
description:
Hello,


I decided to come up with design kits and this my first humble take on how to create a design system. To make it clear, take this kit with a grain of salt. I'm not trying to define any standards or anything Just trying to express an ideology how it could be applied and to reflect metdologies.


I also wrote an article of my workflow for this project.

Read it on Medium


If you have any feedback please let me know.
